content.raw:
Hi everyone,

sorry for keeping quiet for so long. I investigated the issue about models being displayed incorrectly a little more. Unfortunately the ColladaLoader.js is not in a finalized state and changes with revisions. On the latest r73 we have problems with multiple materials assigned to one mesh (I try to avoid that with our models). We also have flipped normals for some models (like the house3 model is showing for me). One of our hotfixes was a little script that adds an <extra><technique><double_sided> tag to materials/models in question (it's understood by Three.js and doesn't cause memory overhead).
